thread.title: Has Any One Here Made MD2 Files or MD3 File Using Maya?

post.author: ajm113
post.body: I want to animate character animation for my game engine as a test, but I can't find anything of a plugin or tutorial to export md2 or md3 files using Maya, I would use Blender, but it's animation system GUI is kinda messy. So I was wondering if someone can help me out animating a model for md2 using Maya and exporting it.
